meta.job_title: Director of Summer at Santa Catalina

duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the entire planning and implementation of Summer at Santa Catalina.
Direct the hiring, training, and support for teachers and residential counselors to provide an outstanding program.
Manage the budget for Summer at Santa Catalina within the Auxiliary Programs Department budget.
Coordinate with various campus departments to implement the smooth operation of summer and auxiliary programs.
Build relationships with multiple constituents including camp and school families to ensure the delivery of high-quality resident and day summer programming.
Plan and execute marketing campaigns for Summer at Santa Catalina.
